branchCategory.name: KS, Rotary One-touch Fitting, Metric
branchCategory.description: <p>Rotary one-touch fitting series KS comes with a ball race bearing for oscillating or rotating applications. KS series comes in 5 tube sizes ranging from 4 to 12mm. One-touch collet includes anti tube rotation mechanism. KS is suitable for copper free applications.</p>
